Syllable of Light.name: Syllable of Light
Syllable of Light.flavor: You whisper an otherworldly tone, and lights swirl around you, blinding your foes and surrounding your allies in cloaks of radiance.
Syllable of Light.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded and deafened until the end of your next turn.
Syllable of Light.effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses and resist 5 radiant until the end of your next turn.

Guiding Syllable.name: Guiding Syllable
Guiding Syllable.flavor: A syllable of the Word is enough to guide othersâ€™ steps.
Guiding Syllable.target: You and each ally in the burst
Guiding Syllable.effect: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier. The next time the target hits with an attack before the end of your next turn, you can slide the hit creature 1 square as a free action.

The Word Spoken.name: The Word Spoken
The Word Spoken.flavor: In a soft voice, you intone the complete Word, unleashing sublime destruction.
The Word Spoken.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends). In addition, the target fails its next saving throw before the end of the encounter.
The Word Spoken.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
